call_title: Ergo PoW Blockchain - Weekly Update & AMA - November 14th 2024

decisions.decision: New multisig members will be Luivatra, CW, Mark the Shark, Jake the Snake, and CannonQ
decisions.speaker: qx()
decisions.context: Current multisig members are not always active in the ecosystem
decisions.quote: I believe it's Luivatra, CW, Mark the Shark, Jake the Snake, and CannonQ

decisions.decision: Mark temporarily turned off Rosen token mining payments and returned to mine core payments
decisions.speaker: qx()
decisions.context: Needed a couple more tweaks after testing revealed issues
decisions.quote: He had it on for, I think, two days and then pulled it back and turned on mine core payments again

commitments.commitment: Finish Ergo names project during Thanksgiving and Christmas break
commitments.quote: So hoping to use that time to get more involved again in Ergo names, but we have Thanksgiving and Christmas. So I'm pretty confident I can finish it then

commitments.commitment: Complete Moria Finance (multisig web interface) after Nautilus updates
commitments.quote: I would definitely maybe that'll be Easter or something. I think possible work or Christmas

commitments.commitment: Keystone wallet integration to be completed
commitments.quote: I think he said the end of the year recently. He said for sure

commitments.commitment: Create new multisig in a ceremony and send one big transaction from old to new
commitments.quote: we'll create the multisig in a little ceremony with wine and cheese, maybe some sausage. And then we'll send one big transaction from the old multisig to the new one

open_questions.question: When will Dogecoin integration with Rosen Bridge be available
open_questions.context: Discussion about Trump's DOGE department and potential Dogecoin price movement

open_questions.question: When will Kraken listing happen
open_questions.context: Ergo is on Kraken's shortlist but timing is uncertain

open_questions.question: When will Palmyra launch their coin/token
open_questions.context: Community asking about timing for Palmyra project token launch

reversals_or_updates.previous: Old multisig with early members who are not always active
reversals_or_updates.update: New multisig with active Sigmanauts members
reversals_or_updates.reason: Current multisig members are not always in the ecosystem, transactions take too long
reversals_or_updates.speaker: qx()

key_facts.fact: Ergo names smart contracts are completed, only off-chain work remains
key_facts.speaker: MGpai

key_facts.fact: Dogecoin went from 11 cents to 30+ cents (3x increase)
key_facts.speaker: qx()

key_facts.fact: 11,435 people in the Ergo Telegram chat
key_facts.speaker: qx()

key_facts.fact: Sigma Explorer has completely different backend built from ground up, fastest and most scalable Explorer
key_facts.speaker: MGpai

key_facts.fact: Ergo was number one or two most profitable coin to mine when price was around 130
key_facts.speaker: qx()

key_facts.fact: Keystone wallet integration is blocked by a rust library issue in Sigma rust
key_facts.speaker: MGpai

key_facts.fact: 7.8% slippage hit for swapping 1000 ERG to Rosen BTC on ErgoDEX
key_facts.speaker: qx()

key_facts.fact: Sky Harbor marketplace frontend UI version 2 finished and in testing, backend has not much work left
key_facts.speaker: qx()
